name: Rollin' Rocko demo
description:
A demo for a work-in-progress puzzle platformer

Roll, jump, and think your way through a series of challenges!  The game features non-linear levels with platforming, brain teasers, and secrets to find. The Rollin' Rocko demo is limited to the first level.

Follow Rollin' Rocko on Twitter: https://twitter.com/gplaysupremacy

For best experience do not play in full screen.

CONTROLS

- A and D to roll; Spacebar to jump
- Esc to pause
